content:
When I try to uninstall certain old toolchains, I get the following error:

~ â–¸ elan toolchain uninstall leanprover/lean4:nightly-2023-04-11
info: uninstalling toolchain 'leanprover/lean4:nightly-2023-04-11'
error: could not remove 'update hash' file: '/Users/thomas/.elan/update-hashes/leanprover--lean4---nightly-2023-04-11'
info: caused by: No such file or directory (os error 2)

(I'm on MacOS, and just ran brew upgrade elan.)
I checked manually, and indeed the update hash file doesn't exist (but the toolchain does).
I got around it just now by touching the path, so I suppose it's not really an issue, but thought I'd mention it anyway in case anyone else ran into it :)
